text: egh ia kamaghɨn fogh, God ikɨzir kaba me batueghan kogham. Eghtɨ me azuaziba asɨzibar suizi moghɨn, ia bagh azuaziba guightɨ da ian suigham. Egh ian akɨraghariba ifozoroghtɨ, ia mɨzaziba baraghtɨ, me dɨkonibar ian damazibagh inivɨghasam. Eghtɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, ia ganɨngizir nguazir aghuir kam, ia an ikɨ mɨzazir kaba ini mangɨ gɨn ia ovengam.
